ep_summary: A teacher from Kirkland, Washington, wants to escape her mundane life with a move to Chiang Mai, Thailand. Adapting to Thai living isn't easy, so her friend and coworker joins the house hunt to remind her why she took the big leap in the first place.
ep_title: Looking for Change in Chiang Mai, Thailand

ep_summary: A job opportunity brought world traveler Gitanjali from Reno, Nevada, to Buenos Aires, Argentina, where she'll be living alone for the very first time. Her local friend Macarena is there to show her the ropes and keep her in check with her never-ending, nitpicky wish list.
ep_title: First Home Alone in Buenos Aires, Argentina

ep_summary: A couple puts her law career on hold to support his military promotion in Hainaut, Belgium. Between their dog, his motorcycle and her desire to start a family, however, the young couple will have to agree on their priorities before they can move into any home.

A woman yearning to break free from suburban life in Texas leaps at the opportunity to follow her husband's job to Bangkok, Thailand. However, once overseas, she's anxious about the changes that come with living in a big city and longs for the comforts of home.

A young couple searches for a home to call their own in the capital city of Athens, Greece. Despite his attempts at independence, her large Greek family has a lot to say in the matter and the couple will have to decide whose opinion matters more.
ep_title: My Big Fat Greek House Hunt

ep_summary: A California couple leaves the comforts of family for the first time to pursue a job opportunity in Amsterdam. She's dreading life without her mom nearby, but that's quickly dwarfed by the complications of adjusting to life, work and the high cost of living in Amsterdam.
ep_title: Leaving the Nest for the Netherlands

ep_summary: A Colorado couple with nonprofit experience is moving to Dominica to help with recovery after Hurricane Maria. They decide to buy a house on the island, and while she would like a place with rental potential to help offset the cost, he wants a secluded paradise.

An American Ph.D. student and cancer survivor moves to England to work on a cure at a leading university. She's hoping to find an adult space on a student budget but finding an affordable, roomy space will be a tough first lesson to learn in London.

An Australian woman convinced her husband to take a job in Singapore. It was her idea to move, so he's hoping to get the resort-style apartment of his dreams. But in one of the world's most expensive cities, they may be getting in over their heads.

A California couple seeks a slower pace in Mexico. One half is a nurse, and he's ready to park himself on the beach for a well-deserved break. His partner, a landscape architect, wants to get his hands dirty with garden work in his dream jungle home.
ep_title: The Quest for Less Stress in Riviera Nayarit

ep_summary: These young parents thought they were on the same page when they uprooted their family to New Zealand. Only now they see their ideas for this family venture differ greatly. He wants city life, but for her ocean access is the key to a happy family.

A couple moves to her home country to be closer to family in South Holland, Netherlands. They're looking for two bedrooms and a yard for their dogs, but he wants to be in the city while she's looking for a place with a small town feel.
ep_title: Cows and Culture in South Holland

ep_summary: After living in close quarters in Amsterdam for several years, an adventurous expat family is hoping for more space in Scotland. Her job takes her into town, however, where the housing is cramped. He's a mountain man who hopes to live farther out, closer to nature.
ep_title: A Return to Nature in Scotland

ep_summary: An empty nester that fell in love with Ireland early in life decides to return there for good. She has a plan to start a bed and breakfast, but she quickly realizes that doing so in the remote Irish countryside is more challenging than she thought.

A Washington, DC, couple that fell in love with Australia's vibe while studying abroad decided to return to the country's slower pace. Now, their lease is up and they want to buy, but they can't agree on how much to invest while she's looking for work.

A Knoxville, Tennessee, woman decides to make a permanent move to Merida, Mexico, after traveling there for a root canal. She quickly discovers that having champagne tastes on a cerveza budget means she may need to build from the ground up to get what she wants.

A young couple is at their wits end with work in Canada and decides to start fresh in Yeppoon, Australia. He likes simplicity and wants no more than a beach shack, but she's looking for a little luxury to make up for her long work hours.

A busy Brooklyn couple looks for their perfect retreat on St. John in the US Virgin Islands. He's looking for a home with modern touches while she wants an island feel, but they need a place that can generate rental income to make any purchase work.
ep_title: A Big Apple Escape to St. John

ep_summary: A Wisconsin couple looks to buy a second home for their large family in Eastern Puerto Rico. She wants something turnkey with plenty of outdoor space for their six kids, but he's a sucker for a deal and doesn't mind a renovation project to save money.
ep_title: Fostering a New Life in Puerto Rico

ep_summary: A newly engaged couple looks to move from Oslo, Norway, and put down roots in their favorite city of Paris. She dreams of buying an apartment with tons of Parisian charm, but he's a frugal Frenchman who believes that he's got all the charm she needs.

A South African couple wants to give their toddler a better life and move to Auckland, New Zealand. He wants a place that's close to the beach with a good view and doesn't mind an apartment, but she doesn't like heights and wants a ground-level home.
ep_title: Going High or Going Low in Auckland

ep_summary: A Los Angeles couple can't wait to ditch their busy lives and head to the Manabi Province in Ecuador. They want to stay within a modest budget as renters and find a private place with at least two bedrooms and an outdoor area they can enjoy.

A newlywed couple are at odds over buying or renting their first home in Paris, France. She's moving from Atlanta and wants to purchase a home with plenty of room, but he's already living in Paris and prefers to rent a place that's in the city.
ep_title: A Renting vs. Buying Battle in Paris

ep_summary: A couple and their two young girls fulfill a dream of living near the beach in Redcliffe, Australia. They're looking for a great water view and need office space and parking for their motorhome, and she doesn't mind a fixer-upper but he wants a new build.

An newly engaged couple takes the first big step in their 4-part life plan and looks for a place in his hometown of Dublin. He wants to stay Southside and doesn't mind a fixer-upper, but she's open to explore other areas of Dublin and prefers turnkey.
ep_title: House, Dog, Ring, Baby, in Dublin

ep_summary: A city girl gives up a vibrant Austin, Texas, to begin a new relationship in his tiny hometown of Cardwell, Australia. They're looking for a place with three bedrooms that's near his family, but she wants a home with modern touches and a bit of luxury.

A South African single father of two sons seeks a life less ordinary in Whangarei, New Zealand. They're looking for a house with three bedrooms, and his oldest son wants to be close to town and shops, but Dad prefers a place that's near the water.
ep_title: Tattoos and No Shoes in Whangarei

ep_summary: A couple looks to build a more sustainable lifestyle and move to Faial Island, Azores. They're looking for a lot of land to open an eco-friendly bed and breakfast, and she wants a property that's turnkey, but he doesn't mind a project that can build on.

A newly single Englishwoman returns to her roots and looks to own a bed and breakfast in the charming city of Cumbria, England. To realize her lofty vision of the perfect place, her daughter joins the search to offer the perfect mix of head and heart.
ep_title: Head, Heart and Homecoming in Cumbria

ep_summary: At their parents behest, two Croatian brothers are hoping to set up a new family home in Perth, Australia. In a competitive housing market, big brother is happy to take on a project to keep costs down, but little brother is looking for a quicker fix.
ep_title: Brothers Reunite Down Under in Perth

ep_summary: After nearly a decade in rural California, a couple chases the adventure of a lifetime in Chiang Mai, Thailand. They planned their move with two incomes in mind, but now he's decided to put off work and enjoy Chiang Mai's city life, much to her dismay.

As part of a self-described midlife crisis, a couple decides to try something new and move from South Africa to Dublin. He's looking to relive his younger days and wants to be in the city, but she's seeking a place that's more quiet in the suburbs.

Married serial renters are making a permanent move for a job in Australia. Shes willing to spend big to find a dream home with ceilings tall enough for her 12-foot Christmas tree, but going down to one income has him pumping the brakes on their finances.
ep_title: Make Room for the Tree in Margate

ep_summary: A couple moves for his sweet new job at a chocolate factory in Berlin. Their search quickly turns sour, however, as she's looking for a chic, urban lifestyle in the heart of the city, while he prefers a place in the sleepy outskirts that's near work.
ep_title: Sweet Dreams, Sour Hunt in Berlin

ep_summary: A fitness entrepreneur and his showbiz wife are leaving their hectic LA lives to pursue a business venture in Tulum, Mexico. She wants to start slow with a modern house in town, but he prefers to hit the ground running with a home in the jungle.
ep_title: The Business of Adventure in Tulum

ep_summary: A couple is finally realizing their plan to adopt a more chill lifestyle in Cabo San Lucas, Mexico. Hes the life of the party and wants to live downtown near the action, but she's a homebody who prefers a little distance from the ruckus to relax.
ep_title: Bars vs Balance in Cabo San Lucas

ep_summary: After only three months of dating, a New York woman puts it all on the line for love and moves to Redcliffe, Australia. She's looking to buy a house with her new boyfriend, but they begin to realize they have different ideas about the perfect home.
ep_title: Leaving New York for Love Down Under

ep_summary: A Washington couple is ready to make their favorite vacation destination of Puerto Vallarta, Mexico, a new home for their family of four. They want cultural diversity for their kids, a home that won't break the bank and a long wish list on a tight budget.
ep_title: Diversity, Vacation and Destination in Mexico

ep_summary: After 20 years making sacrifices for her career, a woman finally lands her dream job in Paris. She's ready to fall in love with a new city and a new person, but she won't settle for anything less than the perfect man and the perfect home.

After the birth of their son, a couple is leaving Washington, D.C., to follow her roots back to Brisbane, Australia. She has a set list of everything their family needs, but he is more focused on spending whatever it costs to get the amenities he wants.
ep_title: To Make or Not Make a List

ep_summary: A Minnesota family takes a chance on a job transfer to the warm ocean town of Brisbane, Australia. The promise of more family time is a big motivator for the move, but the newness of a single income threatens to limit the lifestyle they all imagined.
ep_title: Big Brisbane Dreams for a Family's First Move

ep_summary: A couple in the wedding photo and video business decide to seek out a change in Granada, Spain. They're hoping to find new clients as they leave all their old ones behind, but with only three months of rent saved, they'll need to make some compromises.
ep_title: Shaking Up Their Biz in Granada

ep_summary: An English woman looks to leave the stress of long London work weeks for a better life in Phnom Penh, Cambodia. She's hoping for an opportunity to live in affordable luxury, but she may find that sticker shock, like culture shock, is part of the journey.
ep_title: Looking for the Good Life in Phnom Penh

ep_summary: A Vegas couple looks to downsize and search for a home in the burgeoning LGBTQ haven of Puerto Vallarta, Mexico. They're looking for a modern condo that's turnkey, but with prices on the rise, they may need to push their budget to get what they want.
ep_title: Living Their Best LGBTQ Life in Puerto Vallarta

ep_summary: A New York City couple takes advantage of a job opportunity and relocates to London. They love to travel and are excited with all Europe has to offer, but she wants a place in a lively location while he prefers something tranquil in a quiet neighborhood.
ep_title: It's Not How You Start, But How You Finish in London

ep_summary: A London couple is tired of small houses and bad weather and looks to move their family to her hometown of Adelaide, Australia. They're hoping to find a better quality of life, but the charm she seeks invites the spiders and snakes that make him freak.
ep_title: Homecoming and Heritage in Adelaide, Australia

ep_summary: An Arizona mother with a psychic gift looks to make a drastic change and move with her kids to Puerto Vallarta, Mexico. She's looking for a lot of space for a little money, but her ability to sense a home's past energies only complicates the search.
ep_title: Only Good Vibes in Puerto Vallarta

ep_summary: An overworked DC lawyer leaves corporate America and takes a chance on a new business in Puerto Viejo, Costa Rica. She's looking to open a bed and breakfast, but with stiff competition, she may have to take on a project to find something she can afford.
ep_title: Price vs. Project in Costa Rica

ep_summary: A Brit and an American fell in love in LA, and with his visa ending, she's ready to jump the pond and relocate to London, England. She's looking for a place that's comfortable for her cat, but he's more concerned with finding something in their budget.
ep_title: From Hollywood to Hackney with a Meow

ep_summary: An Austin couple trades the music capital of Texas for the Netherlands so she can finally follow her dream of working in Europe. She wants to be in the city center, but he's a professional musician and needs a big workshop for his giant robot drummer.
ep_title: Robot vs. Dream in the Netherlands

ep_summary: After years of working abroad, a US diplomat is ready to plant roots in Epernay, the heart of French wine country. She's looking for a place with plenty of French charm, but modest purse strings may put a squeeze on finding the property of her dreams.

A Maine couple looks to fulfill her longtime dream to live abroad in Mayenne, France. His job requires that he stay stateside for now, so she'll be making the move on her own and wants a place where she can garden and be near a community.
ep_title: Mom's Turn to Leave the Nest

ep_summary: A Texas couple raising their five kids in the suburbs takes advantage of a job transfer to London. Everything may be bigger in the Lone Star State, but trying to fit a family of seven in a classic English property will prove to be a challenge.

After 10 years at home, a young Canadian woman looks to give Australia a second try and searches for a place in Brisbane. She's looking for a one-bedroom apartment in the thriving New Farm area, but finding a place in her budget may be a challenge.

House flipping flight attendants Bob and Phyllis are moving to Sicily, Italy, after they were tipped off to the good deals by their daughter, Jessie. However, first they'll have to agree on how big a project they can take on before this dream takes flight.
ep_title: Flight Attendants Land in Sicily, Italy

ep_summary: After a few brutally cold winters in Chicago, Meeta is ready for warmer climates and island living on the American territory of Guam. Serving as a proxy for their parents, sister Raji accompanies Meeta on the house hunt and helps her make a family decision.

A couple looks to celebrate the completion of a massive renovation on their Los Angles hotel by buying a magical pueblo escape in Alamos, Mexico. They both want a big hacienda for entertaining but disagree on whether to purchase a turnkey home or another fixer-upper.

A Texas couple wants to introduce their son to his heritage by buying a house in Faaborg, Denmark, and both want a home with old Danish charm, but she prefers move-in ready in the city center while he dreams of a fixer-upper outside of town.

A couple wants to escape their busy accounting firm for the beaches of Puerto Vallarta, Mexico. He doesn't mind breaking the bank for a place that has everything he wants, but she knows they have to keep their business afloat to afford a second home.

Adventure-loving Nik couldn't pass up a job offer in Bangalore, India, and while Misty lived with him in Europe before, India will be a drastic difference. She's determinded to find Western comforts in their new home, but Nik's concerned with living on a one-income budget.

After reading about country life in Italy, a San Antonio woman decides to sell her possessions and move to the tiny town of Abbateggio. The decision to move might've been impulsive, but her best friend tags along to make sure picking a house is not.

A family follows a job transfer to Antwerp, Belgium, but has different ideas on how to get the full experience. She wants a home with Belgian charm in the heart of the action, but he's looking for a suburban home that guarantees a short commute.

A biologist is moving his entire family to the south of France for a fellowship opportunity. He wants to find a country house in biking distance of his job while his wife is more concerned with having modern amenities and living close to a town.

After spending their whole lives in Australia, a couple of adventurous world travelers packed their bags for the Netherlands and didn't look back. They're young, in love and fear nothing, but settling in Amsterdam may require more than hugs and kisses at their price point.

A Canadian woman is leaving both her home and family to go on a European adventure! She fell in love with the area the first time she visited and hopes her best friend can help her find the perfect home in historic Prague, Czech Republic.

A Beverly Hills real estate agent and interior designer is looking for a slower-paced lifestyle near his mother in Cuernavaca, Mexico. He adores the Spanish colonial-style homes with their expansive gardens, but his agent thinks he should consider something that requires less time and attention.
ep_title: Property Expert Faceoff in Cuernavaca, Mexico

ep_summary: A Connecticut man decides to leave everything behind to accept a job offer in Sydney, Australia, only to find out the position was moved to Melbourne at the last minute. Now he has no choice but to start anew in a city he doesn't know.

A Los Angeles woman leaves her old life behind to start anew as a travel writer in Bali. She leans on her dad to point her in the right direction, but her strong will may stand in the way of dad's safe and solid advice.
ep_title: Starting a New Life in Bali

ep_summary: A woman that's vacationed in Tulum, Mexico, several times decides it's time to invest in a property she can live in and rent. However, she quickly discovers that seeing a property from an investment point of view is different than finding something she will love.

Former Bachelor star turned realtor Arie Luyendyk drives a couple toward a new home in the Netherlands. Accountants Bill and Jenny want to shake things up, but their big expectations hit the wall when they aren't prepared for Amsterdam's large price tags and small spaces.
ep_title: Amsterdam, Will You Accept This Tulip?

ep_summary: A wine connoisseur moves with her family to Epernay, France, in the heart of the Champagne region. They consider the options between the sprawling vineyard countryside and the bustling town center, but there's no easy answer as they decide what's best for their 8-year-old daughter.
ep_title: From Vancouver to the Vineyards of Epernay, France

ep_summary: These empty nesters made a lot improvements to their Colorado rental hoping to purchase, but when the housing market skyrocketed, they had to come up with plan B. The affordability and status of Lo de Marcos made it an easy choice on where to buy.

A young couple takes a chance in Taipei, Taiwan after mutual job opportunities arise. They have a friend in town, but even with help, agreeing on what area to live in is a challenge in this land of heavy traffic, odd restaurants and stinky tofu.
ep_title: Teachers Learn the Strange Ways of Taipei

ep_summary: After 11 years in the Marines, a young couple is ready to refocus on each other with a move to New Zealand. However, the house hunt reveals a rift when one is pushing for financial restraint and the other is dreaming big at all costs.

A Florida woman is buying a home in the small village of Arezzo, Italy. She attributes a blessing from a church in the village with helping her conceive her only child, and she's looking for a home that lives up to her now-teenager's cool standards.
ep_title: A Miracle Comes Home to Arezzo

ep_summary: A Brit that stayed stateside after college wants to return to her side of the pond with her husband and kids. They settle on Gandia, Spain, but while he wants to downsize in the city center, she envisions a Spanish villa with an English garden.

A couple faces big changes when they decide to get married and follow a dream job offer to Geneva, Switzerland. While he's in between jobs, he wants to live close to town to stay connected, but she prefers the suburbs to escape the city noise.

After a helicopter crash nearly ended his life, an Australian man and his family set their sights on Obidos, Portugal. With bills to pay and a son ready for college, the family must build a business and find a home, all without breaking the bank.

A couple decides to ditch pricey San Francisco and set their sights on living abroad in Portugal. She wants to relax in the southern coastal region, but he prefers the famous bike routes in Tavira, and one compromise could send their dreams up in smoke.

After years of temporary jobs in Portugal, a young woman finds work in Vienna that puts her on track for a dream career. However, she must leave her boyfriend behind until he finishes school and find an affordable place that will work for them both.

A growing family looks to get closer to an ailing parent while taking advantage of a new job in Male, Maldives. They're looking for a two-bedroom apartment that's near his work, and while he wants ocean views, she wants to be near shops and cafes.
ep_title: More Than Meets the Eye in Male

ep_summary: A career-driven man gets a new outlook on life after his father's passing and moves to Prague. His girlfriend prefers to be near the city center, but he wants to be further out in a more spacious place since they'll both be working from home.

A Florida couple relocates for her job and searches for a home in Stuttgart, Germany. A traditional standalone house with an outdoor space is a must for him, but she wants modern conveniences and a place that's near the city center with an easy commute.

A Georgia couple looks to give their kids an international experience and move for his work to Amsterdam. She's used to a larger home and wants five bedrooms on a canal, but he's watching their budget and wants something smaller with a short work commute.

A recently married couple moves to Bologna, Italy, so he can pursue a degree in the supercar industry. They're looking for a studio space that's near the city center for his school commute, but finding a place on their tight budget will be a challenge.

A British couple looking for big surf and a change of scenery find their dream town in Noosa Shire, Australia. They disagree on where to live, however, as she wants a studio close to farms, but he's hoping for more space close to the sea.

After two years in Japan, a US airman gets a new assignment in Daegu, South Korea. He's looking for a new development with a nice view that can accommodate visiting family, but on his small budget, a spacious place downtown may not be within reach.

After accepting a job promotion, a wife and mother relocates her family of six to Geneva. They're looking for a spacious house with at least four bedrooms, and she's money conscious, but he doesn't mind spending more to get the lake view he really wants.
ep_title: Lake or No Lake in Geneva

ep_summary: A married couple leaves her home of St. Petersburg, Russia, for his job opportunity in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam. She's looking for a quiet home with outdoor space, but he wants a larger place near the city center that's close to the urban hustle.
ep_title: Great Heights in Ho Chi Minh City

ep_summary: A musician looks to make a fresh start and moves his family of seven to Hilversum, Netherlands. They're looking for a large home with at least five bedrooms, but finding the space they need on the money they're willing to spend will be a challenge.
ep_title: Making a New Tune in Hilversum

ep_summary: A couple and their two young sons are moving for his military career to South Limburg, Netherlands. They're looking for a home with four bedrooms and plenty of outdoor space, but they're in a hurry to find a place, so their options may be limited.

A couple and their son decide to leave Virginia and begin a new life in Sydney, Australia. They're looking for a larger family home with plenty of outdoor space, but finding a place with few stairs to accommodate her medical condition will be a challenge.

A couple leaves San Francisco to search for their first place together in Stockholm, Sweden. They're looking for an apartment with a nice outdoor space for their dog, and one wants a more rural setting while the other prefers to be near the city center.

A young family takes on a new military assignment and relocates to Bury St Edmunds, England. Mom is forced to part with her community and her business, and with having to leave so much behind, she does not want to settle for just any house.
ep_title: The Call to Duty in Bury St Edmunds

ep_summary: After years of running resorts all over the world, a couple moves from Fiji back to his native Bribie Island, Australia. Shes excited for a less hectic lifestyle and more family time, but he wants to bring some of the resort life along with them.
ep_title: A Better Life on Bribie Island

ep_summary: A lifelong Francophile and her hairstylist husband look to reconnect with his family and realize her dream of moving to the French Riviera. They're looking for a place near his job in Monaco, but her French fantasy may not be as luxurious as it seems.
ep_title: A Cut Above on the French Riviera

ep_summary: A successful New York City doctor puts it all on the line to move closer to family in Australia. With so many changes to every facet of her life, she recruits her high school best friend to be a voice of reason in the search.
ep_title: Just What the Doctor Ordered in Melbourne

ep_summary: An expecting Ohio husband and wife looks to relocate to raise their baby in London. They have a deep connection and nostalgia for London, but with a dog, a cat and very particular criteria, finding a flat that meets their expectations with be a challenge.

After teaching in China, a newly engaged couple opts for Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam. They're looking for a larger ex-pat community and a warmer climate, but with a wedding to pay for, they find they have different priorities when it comes to a home.

After years in New York, a woman is returning return home to Amsterdam to introduce her kids with their Dutch heritage, but her American husband can't shake his high standards and need for the familiar while they rush to find work and a new home.

Along with their horse, a family of six looks to relocate from Singapore to Australia. A multimillion-dollar budget helps, but when mom and dad disagree on location, all the money (and hay) in the world might not be enough to get them what they want.
ep_title: Saddle Up in the Sunshine Coast

ep_summary: A single mom entrepreneur is moving to her beloved vacation destination of Puerto Vallarta, Mexico. She wants a unique home that matches her unique life, but to make her move a success, she'll need to find space for both her kids and business to grow.
ep_title: Resetting With a Return to Puerto Vallarta

ep_summary: A California family of six looks for a simpler and more humble lifestyle in Costa Rica. Finding consensus among four kids is hard enough, but with financial limits and a wilder new terrain, finding a home that fits their many needs will be an adventure.
ep_title: Simpler Living in Nosara, Costa Rica

ep_summary: A young midwestern woman looks to fulfill her childhood dream and find a home in Edinburgh, Scotland. She's looking for a place with plenty of room that can accommodate her dog, but finding a place that meets her extensive wish list will be a challenge.

A family looks to relocate to dad's childhood vacation spot in Oropesa del Mar, Spain. They want their daughter to have an international experience, and he insists that they find a castle, but getting him to have a more grounded view will be a challenge.
ep_title: A Castle Hassle in Oropesa del Mar

ep_summary: A New York couple bonded over a desire to live internationally, and now these newlyweds are following a job offer to Cork, Ireland. While they are eager to pursue their dream, high expectations and a long wish list cause some friction on this rental hunt.

A family of three leaves behind South Africa for a life near the beach on the Sunshine Coast of Australia. They're looking to live off the land by farming, but with major career changes, finding the Queensland home of their dreams will be a challenge.
ep_title: Fertile vs. Futile on the Sunshine Coast

ep_summary: A solo world traveler has finally worked up the nerve to pursue his dream of living abroad in Dublin. He's ditched his home in Dallas only to discover that he's priced out of a red-hot Dublin market, so finding a compromise will be a challenge.
ep_title: Big Dreams, Bigger Doubts, in Dublin

ep_summary: A family leaves Papua New Guinea to give their kids roots in the beach town of Port Douglas, Australia. He wants a large Australian-style home they can grow into, but she prefers a smaller place that lets her focus on family and a beachy lifestyle.
ep_title: From Jungle to Sea in Port Douglas, Australia

ep_summary: A single woman looks to follow in the footsteps of literary greats and relocate with her elderly dogs to Paris. She's looking for her ideal vision of 1920s cafe culture in the Latin Quarter, but finding an apartment in her budget will be a challenge.
ep_title: Ooh La La Woof, in Paris

ep_summary: Recent college grads are moving from Oregon to work as English teachers in Granada, Spain. They're living together for the first time and she has a long wish list, but in a red-hot rental market, finding a place in their budget will be a challenge.

When an ancestry test reveals Mayan roots, a young family relocates and explores its heritage in Merida, Mexico. They see eye to eye on the cultural side, but he wants to be in the city center while she prefers a family-friendly place in the outskirts.
ep_title: A Return to Mayan Roots in Merida

ep_summary: A young married couple decides to leave Canada in search of a more laid-back lifestyle in Costa Rica. They're looking to put down roots in the beach town of Ojochal, but a surprise pregnancy has them moving faster than expected to find the right place.
ep_title: From One Adventure to the Next in Costa Rica

ep_summary: Newly enabled to work remotely, a Canadian woman looks to escape the cold and head south to live her best life in Ajijic, Mexico. She wants to live a healthier, sunnier lifestyle poolside with her puppy, but her frugal friend may foil her big dreams.
ep_title: Living Her Best Life in Ajijic, Mexico

ep_summary: An Aussie movie trailer editor and her Kiwi husband are leaving NYC and moving back to his roots in Auckland, New Zealand. They're looking for a place that's near his family, and he wants something modern, but she prefers a home with character and charm.

An Oregon couple looks to reconnect with family and give their kids a chance to live abroad in Cairns, Australia. They want to rent a home similar to what they had in Portland, but being closer to their Aussie family will come with some trade-offs.
ep_title: Returning to Roots in Cairns, Australia

ep_summary: Newlyweds Meghan and Jason are moving from Nashville to Antwerp, Belgium, to fulfill Meghan's lifelong dream of living and working in Europe. But will this honeymoon house hunt give Meghan the European experience she's dreamed of, or will it become a marital bliss nightmare?
ep_title: Take Me by the Hand, Antwerp

ep_summary: A Nebraska couple moves to Barcelona to pursue a PhD. She's excited to find a home in the midst of the city's art, architecture and history, but he's perfectly happy living a student's life on a student's budget in the suburbs near his school.
ep_title: Kendo and a PhD in Barcelona

ep_summary: After years in a demanding advertising job, a man follows a job opportunity to Amsterdam. He brings his best friend to help him explore the area and find a home, but when he starts nitpicking, she struggles to help him find the perfect home.

A couple leaves the Big Apple to manage a new hotel in Playa del Carmen, Mexico. Conflict arises when their modest budget and one's desire for a place by the beach competes with the other's wish to be closer to his family across town.

John and Aisha are living out their lifelong dream by moving from the cold winters of Baltimore, Maryland, to the warm beach sands of Coronado, Panama. Aisha wants a house with a backyard for gardening, and John wants a condo directly on the beach.

An adventurous couple from Cape Town, South Africa, is moving to Hanoi, Vietnam, where they will live together for the first time. They want to teach English to fund their travels, but with only her job to support them, he's on edge about finances.
ep_title: Ready to be Roommates in Hanoi, Vietnam

ep_summary: An adventurous couple makes a spontaneous decision to leave Texas and transfer to Darwin, Australia. While she seeks an ocean view and he wishes to stay near their office, both could come at the cost of finding a pet-friendly place for their two dogs.

Newlyweds are moving to Valencia, Spain, just months after tying the knot so he can finish his master's in music. They're excited to experience the culture, but because neither of them have jobs, she's anxious about spending their savings on his dream Spanish home.
ep_title: Following the Beat to Valencia, Spain

ep_summary: A woman transfers her military job to Hainaut, Belgium, and a local friend lends a hand with the home hunt. While she's torn between living close to base or near the city center, her friend has his own ulterior motives for keeping her nearby.

Newlyweds Adam and Nameeta are moving from Canada to Newcastle, Australia, to follow Adam's job at an expanding auction house. With no support system and a new marriage, their different ideas of the perfect house are just a couple of the challenges they'll face.

A couple that wants to start a fashion business and expose their daughter to another culture moves to Medellin, Colombia. She wants a home with a quiet area where she can work on her designs, but he and their daughter want space to dance.

Colorado newlyweds are making a transitional move to Manta, Ecuador, with the intention of moving their permanently after his daughters leave the nest. But before they can settle into happily ever after, they'll have to settle their disagreement about where in town to live.
ep_title: Keeping the Adventure Alive in Ecuador

ep_summary: A Dutch expatriate has always wanted her husband and kids to share the same experiences that filled her childhood, and after years of planning, they're finally ready to purchase in Utrecht. But fulfilling her dreams requires finding office space for him to keep working.

A couple with three kids jumps on the opportunity to move abroad after a job offer in Germany arises. His dream is a short commute in Kaiserslautern, but her wish for a great neighborhood may put him on the Autobahn more than he desires.

Young Canadian newlyweds fell in love with Germany on their honeymoon, so they decided to pack up and pursue graduate school in Berlin. Between the two of them they have big dreams, but they will have to get creative on a shoestring student budget.

A young Canadian woman sets out to live her dream of working abroad. The move requires a big sacrifice from her husband as he must leave both his career and dreams behind but he's eager to help her find the perfect home in Chile.
ep_title: On the Move From Canada to Chile

A husband-and-wife teaching duo relocates from Malaysia to Madrid, Spain. They're eager to teach in an entirely new cultural environment, but they quickly learn that the differences between Malaysia and Madrid extend all the way to the housing market.

A microbiologist has the opportunity do his postdoctoral work in Arnhem, Netherlands, but his wife has never lived more than 30 minutes from her tiny hometown. With so much change unfolding, it's their house hunt that's under the microscope.

An actress and comedian looks for an alternative to life in LA and takes a chance on Puerto Vallarta, Mexico. The bustling city is affordable, which promises flexibility, but the learning curve may be steep for this entrepreneurial entertainer.
ep_title: Looking for Laughs in Puerto Vallarta

ep_title: From Long Distance to Forever, in England

ep_summary: Wooed by the friendly people, good weather and delicious food, two busy entrepreneurs are moving their family to Merida, Mexico. While she's pushing for relaxing beachfront living, he wants to be surrounded by convenience in the city's bustling downtown.

ep_summary: After the birth of their son, a couple leaves their jet-setting lifestyle in South Africa for more family time in Haarlem, Netherlands. They soon discover that quaint Dutch living means choosing between a social location or a family-friendly space.

A French native is returning to France to take advantage of a work opportunity in Montpellier. While her American husband adores French food, culture and charm, he's having a hard time synching with her idea of the perfect space.

After her dads unexpected passing, a London-based culinary entrepreneur moves to her favorite relaxation spot in Playa del Carmen, Mexico. She's looking for something spacious that's near the beach, but her long wish may not agree with her budget.
ep_title: A Recipe for Relaxation in Playa del Carmen

ep_summary: A Colorado family follows mom's dream to become a midwife by moving to York, England. They're relocating to pursue her schooling, but with two young daughters and only one income, the inevitable downsizing they'll face will be a challenge.
ep_title: A Denver Doula Studies Midwifery in York, England

ep_summary: A couple looks to ditch Chicago and reboot in their favorite vacation destination of Puerto Vallarta, Mexico. He's picturing life as a never-ending vacation by the beach, but she thinks the calm suburbs are better suited for their kids.
ep_title: Polarized Priorities in Puerto Vallarta, Mexico

ep_summary: After a whirlwind romance, a newlywed couple relocates so he can pursue his master's degree in Utrecht, Netherlands. They're quickly discovering that they have different priorities in their first home, so finding the ideal place will be a challenge.

A North Carolina couple takes a job transfer and leaves their busy lives for the tranquility of Gloucestershire, England. He wants to embrace the rural lifestyle with evenings surrounded by cows in the countryside, but she prefers city convenience.

After a proposal and marriage in Iceland, newlyweds take advantage of her job opportunity and relocate to Berlin. They're looking for a place that's furnished and pet-friendly, but his body-builder size may find trouble in a smaller, European apartment.

Andrew and Tracy are looking for a home in Pacentro, Italy, a small village where Tracy's family traces its roots, but they're concerned about unexpected details like tiny kitchens and living spaces too small for a large family.

A Florida couple looks to relocate internationally to the vineyard-rich Queretaro region of Mexico for his online wine business. However, with only $500 to spend per month on a rental, they will have to be willing to downsize.

ep_summary: A couple decides to take their long-distance relationship to the next level and find a home in Wellington, New Zealand. They're looking for a place near the city with two bedrooms, but staying in budget will be difficult.

ep_summary: A newly divorced woman looks to challenge herself and seeks adventure in Madrid, Spain. She's looking for a traditional Spanish neighborhood with easy access to public transportation, but on her budget, there will need to be some compromises.

A woman with Welsh roots moves her family to Wales to begin graduate school in music. She also recently discovered she's pregnant, and they're looking for a place with with four bedrooms, and something that's near her school.
